content: gift cards are always a good idea especially if you have a coffee lover in your life there is nothing better than getting a pre-paid card to your favorite coffee spot crochet a quick and easy coffee mug gift card holder for a fun presentation and a keepsake that they can continue to use for credit cards coins dollar bills and more these make wonderful teacher gifts holiday gifts and are perfect for birthdays **materials** bernat super value yarn in lush green and taupe brown size h crochet hook size g hook for a slightly smaller more fitted gift card holder tapestry needle
